name: Holy chess!
description:
We can destroy the destruction of everything that is possible. Want to break the board? Break. Do you want to destroy your own subjects? It doesn't matter, no one will judge you, so keep going! no time limit? Well, then think about what you can do for this.

Gameplay

A game of chess with slightly different rules. Destroy your own and enemies? Break everything to win this game

Story

The devil attacked the heavens and instead of bloodshed, the ashes of chess pieces wake up. Win to become the winner and ruler of paradise
